Articles.Content:
Similar to the F-S192, the F-S182 gives you the ability to explore the skys even mroe comfortably than the F-S192!

Like the F-S192 it has a short takeoff, VERY short landing/stoping time, and can stay in the air for a long time!

Differences from the F-S192 are: More stability, Better speed (about 200m/s), Better asthetics (looks awesome in my opinion) and shorter landing time.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Download: http://www./download/9j99zzqhqm5gbvh/Halco_Industries_F-S182.craft

Have fun with my plane! feel free to edit this and submit your changes!

UPDATE: Download fixed, have fun!
